sec.title: Background
sec.p:
We report first observations of the invasive bamboo pest,
Brachymna tenuis
Stål, 1861 in Korea as the first species of
Brachymna
Stål, 1861 (
Pentatomidae ) reported from the country.

sec.title: New information
sec.p: Comments on its pest status and distribution are provided. General information on this bamboo-feeding insect in Korea is analysed and provided for the first time.
